languages.text: "То, что произошло — не случайность. И если мои подозрения верны..." {n}Арбитес задумчиво рассматривает ладонь, а затем протягивает ее кибермастифу.{/n} "Глейто. Анализ".
languages.translation_comment: Арбитес смотрит на свою ладонь, протягивает руку псу

traits.locale_text: "Скоморох не станет пожимать руку без причины". {n}Арбитес задумчиво рассматривает ладонь — и протягивает ее кибермастифу.{/n} "Глейто. Анализ".

languages.translation_comment: Арбитес смотрит на свою ладонь, протягивает руку псу

languages.text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."
languages.original_text: "То, что произошло — не случайность. И если мои подозрения верны..." {n}Арбитес задумчиво рассматривает ладонь, а затем протягивает ее кибермастифу.{/n} "Глейто. Анализ".

traits.locale_text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then stretches it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito. Analyse."
"What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then stretches it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito. Analyse."
"What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."
"What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."
"What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."
"What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."

languages.text: 「起きたことは事故なんかじゃない。それに、もし俺の疑念が正しければ…」{n}アービトレイターは考え込むように自分の手のひらを見つめ、それからそれをサイバーマスチフに差し出した。{/n}「グライト、解析しろ」
languages.original_text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."

traits.locale_text: 「起きたことは事故なんかじゃない。それに、もし俺の疑念が正しければ…」{n}アービトレイターは考え込むように自分の手のひらを見つめ、それからそれをサイバーマスチフに差し出した。{/n}「グライト、解析しろ」

languages.text: "Olanlar tesadüf değildi. Eğer şüphelerimde haklıysam..." {n}Yargıcı, avucuna düşünceli bir şekilde bakıyor. Adından avucunu siber mastifine uzatıyor.{/n} "Glaito, analiz et."
languages.original_text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."

traits.locale_text: "Olanlar bir tesadüf değildi. Eğer şüphelerimde haklıysam..." {n}Yargıcı, avucuna düşünceli bir şekilde bakıyor. Adından avucunu siber mastifine uzatıyor.{/n} "Glaito, analiz et."

languages.text: «Lo que ocurrió no fue ningún accidente. Y, si mis sospechas están en lo cierto...». {n}El Arbitrator se mira la mano mientras reflexiona, y después la extiende a su cibermastín.{/n} «Glaito, analiza».
languages.original_text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que ocurrió no fue ningún accidente. Y, si mis sospechas están en lo cierto...». {n}El Arbitrator se mira la mano mientras reflexiona, y después la extiende a su cibermastín.{/n} «Glaito, analiza».

languages.text: “之前发生的事情并不是意外，如果我的怀疑没错的话……”{n}索罗蒙若有所思地看着自己的手掌，之后向他的生化獒犬伸出了手。{/n}“格雷托，分析一下。”
languages.original_text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."

traits.locale_text: “之前发生的事情并不是意外，如果我的怀疑没错的话……”{n}索罗蒙若有所思地看着自己的手掌，之后向他的生化獒犬伸出了手。{/n}“格雷托，分析一下。”

languages.text: « Ce qui s'est passé n'était pas un accident. Et si mes soupçons sont fondés... » {n}L'arbitrator regarde sa paume d'un air songeur avant de tendre la main à son cyber-mastiff.{/n} « Analyse-moi ça, Glaito. »
languages.original_text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui s'est passé n'était pas un accident. Et si mes soupçons sont fondés... » {n}L'arbitrator regarde sa paume d'un air songeur avant de tendre la main à son cyber-mastiff.{/n} « Analyse-moi ça, Glaito. »

languages.text: "Was passiert ist, war kein Unfall. Und falls sich mein Verdacht bestätigt ..." {n}Der Arbitrator blickt gedankenverloren auf seine Handfläche und streckt sie schließlich seinem Cyber-Mastiff entgegen.{/n} "Glaito, analysieren."
languages.original_text: "What happened was no accident. And if my suspicions are correct..." {n}The Arbitrator looks at his palm thoughtfully, then holds it out to his cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Glaito, analyse."

traits.locale_text: "Was passiert ist, war kein Unfall. Und falls sich mein Verdacht bestätigt ..." {n}Der Arbitrator blickt gedankenverloren auf seine Handfläche und streckt sie schließlich seinem Cyber-Mastiff entgegen.{/n} "Glaito, analysieren."
